mdRecord.dcterms:description: Signatures: ã⁴ a-p¹² (leaf ã4 is blank)
Errors in foliation: nos. 61-72 omitted; nos. 79-84 repeated.
Special title page (leaf [129]) for: Discours de la philosophie a Passicharis et a Rodanthe. -- A Paris : Pour Felix le Mangnier ..., 1584.
Brunet, t. 3, col. 498 describes a Second volume, with imprint: Paris : Felix Le Mangnier, 1584.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Duru, 1859. In uniform binding with: Oeuures poetiques d'Amadis Iamyn. -- A Paris, 1579. Bookplate of Lucien Double. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 402, v.2.
